dcterms:creator: J. Baumgartner
S. Zannettou
B. Keegan
M. Squire
J. Blackburn
dcterms:description: A dataset containing all Reddit comments for the 2014 and 2015 calendar years, used to evaluate causal inference methods in the Moderation Experiment.
dcterms:title: Reddit Dataset (for Moderation Experiment)

dcterms:creator: V. Veitch
D. Sridhar
D. M. Blei
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of single posts from three subreddits, annotated with the gender of the poster, used to study the impact of gender on post scores.
dcterms:title: Gender Experiment Dataset (from Veitch et al. 2019)

dcterms:creator: J. Baumgartner
S. Zannettou
B. Keegan
M. Squire
J. Blackburn
dcterms:description: A dataset containing public tweets from December 2020, used to evaluate causal inference methods in various experiments.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset (for experiments)
